title: Play is more than just fun
description: A pioneer in research on play, Dr. Stuart Brown says humor, games, roughhousing, flirtation and fantasy are more than just fun. Plenty of play in childhood makes for happy, smart adults -- and keeping it up can make us smarter at any age.
author: Stuart Brown
keywords: TED, talks, brain, children, education, entertainment, gaming, happiness, health, play, psychology, science, Best of the Web
